useCase.name: Update Menu Items

preconditions.precondition: The manager needs to be logged into the Management Interface

successEndConditions.condition: The menu items are successfully updated in the system

useCase.trigger: The manager selects items to update

mainSequence.step: Access the Menu Management section in the Management Interface
Request the current menu items from the Backend Server
Fetch the menu items data from the Database
Display the menu items on the Management Interface
Update menu items request is sent to the Backend Server
Update menu items in the Database
Receive confirmation of the updated items from the Database
Confirm successful update to the Manager
Display a success message to the Manager
